Ref: CXP069/2023

Criteria:

  • Qualification in Procurement / Logistics / Supply Chain Management
  • Minimum of 5 years experience in Buying/Procurement.
  • Member of Chartered Institute of Procurement & Supply (CIPS) preferred
  • Computer literate – MS Office, Google Workspace
  • Competence with ERP software – Oracle/JD Edwards or SAP.
  • Good communications skills and good negotiation skills.

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
